content.rendered:
THE SNEAKER TREND

The sneaker trend continues to rise in popularity, and who does not want to feel comfortable and still look cool. Whether you’re wearing jeans, a dress, or a midi skirt, there are a perfect pair of sneakers that go with every look. Dad sneakers is still a hot trend or the ugly sneaker trend as I like to call it. All white or all black sneakers with chunky soles are the best to invest in if you want to splurge for designer sneakers. The Balenciaga chunky sneakers have been popular with fashion bloggers and influencers for the past 2 years. Check out Instagram for great dad sneakers outfit inspo. Also, for some reason the New Balance white sneakers model 530 are crazy popular with fashion influencers at the moment. The more I see these sneakers the more they look good and I need to purchase them asap. They are sold out in a lot of stores but the link down below still has some sizes in stock.

Click on the product name link to shop. Starting from the top – Balenciaga Triple S Low Top blue and white sneakers, New Balance 530 white sneakers, Balenciaga black with neon trim sneakers, Nike all-white sneakers, Balenciaga white/cream sneakers, and the all-black Prada sneakers.

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, Dionne
